title: Naanum Unnil Paadhi Lyrics Arima Nambi Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song:Â Naanum Unnil Paadhi
Singer: Alma, Rita
Movie: Arima Nambi
Music : Sivamani

naanum unnil paadhi
neeyum ennil paadhi
onril onraai kalappom
indha ulaginai marapom
aasai vandhadhu iyarkai
aadai vanthathu seyarkai
yaagam yaagam kaama deva yaagam
yogam yogam poorva jenma yogam

acham vandhaal thodathe
aasai vanthaal vidathe
azhagellam unathaaga naan kodukiren

bramman ennai padaichan
kaamandathil eduthaan
maharaasi mugaraasi unai sokka vaikume

iravellam thoongamal
iravellam thoongamal
thavam irupen
yaar vandhu ketaalum
varam kodupen
aadaikku vidaikodu..
aasaikku vilaikodu..
en vaazhkai ennodu
yaarum illai ketpatharkku
sugam suthanthirame

pothathu pothathu
eyakathil naan inga thavipathenna
un ullam thaangamal thudipathenna
kattikkol ottikkol
kajiraho sirpam pol pasi thaagam theriyaamal
naam kalanthirukalam

naanum unnil paadhi
neeyum ennil paadhi
onril onraai kalappom
indha ulaginai marapom
aasai vandhadhu iyarkai
aadai vanthathu seyarkai
yaagam yaagam kaama deva yaagam
yogam yogam poorva jenma yogam
